item.title: Apprentice Pilgrim (Level 1)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Master Collector (Level 7)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Hunter (Level 5)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 2)
item.description: Used git blame to annotates a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Apprentice Thug (Level 3)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Dentist
item.description: Extracted patches using git log -p.

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 8)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 7)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Cleaning lady (Level 6)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 9)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 4)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Apprentice Traveler (Level 3)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Collector (Level 6)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Master Miller (Level 8)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 436 times with git add -p.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 3)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 3)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Cleaning lady (Level 5)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice News Reader (Level 1)
item.description: Show logs with difference each commit introduces with git whatchanged

item.title: Presenter (Level 4)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show
